trans-unit.source: Do not build the project before packing. Implies --no-restore.
trans-unit.target: Nesestavujte projekt, dokud ho nezabalíte. Implikuje možnost --no-restore.

trans-unit.source: Include packages with symbols in addition to regular packages in output directory.
trans-unit.target: Zahrne do výstupního adresáře kromě běžných balíčků i balíčky se symboly.

trans-unit.source: Include PDBs and source files. Source files go into the 'src' folder in the resulting nuget package.
trans-unit.target: Zahrne soubory PDB a zdrojové soubory. Zdrojové soubory budou ve složce src ve výsledném balíčku NuGet.

trans-unit.source: Set the serviceable flag in the package. See https://aka.ms/nupkgservicing for more information.
trans-unit.target: Nastaví v balíčku příznak obsluhovatelnosti. Další informace najdete na adrese https://aka.ms/nupkgservicing.

trans-unit.source: Do not display the startup banner or the copyright message.
trans-unit.target: Do not display the startup banner or the copyright message.

trans-unit.source: The output directory to place built packages in.
trans-unit.target: The output directory to place built packages in.

trans-unit.source: The configuration to use for building the package. The default is 'Release'.
trans-unit.target: The configuration to use for building the package. The default is 'Release'.
